title: Rewilding Mathematics
text:
Rewilding Mathematics aims to draw on multidisciplinary expertise to investigate opportunities for mathematics to contribute to rewilding efforts.
We are a group of academics and professionals, predominantly though not exclusively based in the United Kingdom, with a range of backgrounds in research united by the common thread of mathematics. You can find out more about us on the people page.
We have been supported by the International Centre for Mathematical Sciences through the Mathematics for Humanity programme.

title: Rewilding Mathematics
text:
Rewilding Mathematics aims to draw on multidisciplinary expertise to investigate opportunities for mathematics to contribute to rewilding efforts.
We are a group of academics and professionals, predominantly though not exclusively based in the United Kingdom, with a range of backgrounds in research united by the common thread of mathematics. You can find out more about us on the people page.
We have been supported by the International Centre for Mathematical Sciences through the Mathematics for Humanity programme.

title: Rewilding Mathematics
text:
Outputs
We held a series of seminars during the Winter and Spring of 2024, which culminated in a week-long workshop in June centred around the question: how can mathematics help with rewilding?
We intend to publish the results of this workshop in the coming months.

title: Rewilding Mathematics
text:
Enquiries
We are keen to increase the breadth of expertise and diversity of experience in our working group.
Please context EMAIL ADDRESS for any enquiries.

title: Example Blog Post
text:
Writing in Markdown when you’re used to LaTeX or Word is embarassingly easy.
This blog is based on Quarto which uses an extended Markdown syntax with some nice additional functionality. The best place to look for guidance is the Quarto guide.

title: Overview of Rewilding
text:
Additional materials

‘Rewilding’ edited by Pettorelli, Durant and du Toit, CUP https://doi.org/10.1017/9781108560962
du Toit JT, Pettorelli N. The differences between rewilding and restoring an ecologically degraded landscape. J Appl Ecol. 2019; 56:2467–2471.
https://besjournals.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/1365-2664.13487 du Toit JT (2023) Steps to operationalize a rewilding decision: Focus on functional types. Front. Ecol. Evol. 11:1114856.
https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fevo.2023.1114856/full
